text: A water taxi (or called a water bus or sightseeing boat), is a watercraft used to provide public or private transport in an urban area. A water taxi might make multiple stops, similar to a bus, or to on-demand locations, similar to a taxi. A boat service going between two points would normally be called a ferry rather than a water bus or taxi. ==Locations== Water buses and water taxis are used in the following locations: ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Public transport Category:Watercraft
title: Water taxi
